=======
Authors
=======

`St√©phane De Mita <http://mycor.nancy.inra.fr/EFPFteam/?page_id=19>`_
and Mathieu Siol are both evolutionary biologists and population geneticists working at INRA institute in Nancy
and Dijon (France), respectively. They partly developped EggLib as part of the
`arcad <http://www.arcad-project.org/>`_ project.
